snippet: Whether Barack Obama is re-elected or Mitt Romney becomes the 45th president of the United States, the challenges of the Arab Spring will be there to confront either man. In addition, a President Romney might have some international fences to mend.
abstract: Whether Barack Obama is re-elected or Mitt Romney becomes the 45th president of the United States, the challenges of the Arab Spring will be there to confront either man. In addition, a President Romney might have some international fences to mend.

headline.main: What Would a President Romney Mean for the Arab Spring? For Europe?

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
